idea:
We are Digital Hearing Aid Dealers in Mumbai & Pune and are looking to expand to other cities in India and spread awareness and knowledge regarding Hearing Aid and its benefits to Hearing Impaired people in India.


We have seen in our journey that due to limited knowledge and awareness available in public domain regarding hearing aid, many people buy a hearing aid on someone referring a brand or just as a impulsive buy.


We believe that this is a health / medical device and needs proper medical guidance & counselling before dispensing an hearing aid to the potential user.

lot of people still avoid using a Hearing Aid because of their previous bad experience with a hearing aid or social stigma.


We believe there is a huge gap in the market for hearing aid and with the right information platform and counselling, this business can be scaled to new heights.
name: YOHEAR INDIA

idea:
Quantitative investing is beginning to pick up in India and we believe that we are at just the right place at the right time. We want to leverage technology and finance to build products that help investors meet their financial goals while removing the human elements.

We are a team of economists, engineers, and mathematicians, who are passionate about finding ways to help you achieve your financial goals.

Brought together by our love for the markets and a strong desire to build the best of systems, we have created a suite of products for all your portfolio research needs.
name: SimplyQuant

idea:
Dear sir/madam,
Greetings of the day !!
I would like to introduce our company,ISM Sewing Machines that has been in business Industrial Garment Machineries Sales & Service (Cut to Finishing ) for the past 10 years
We are promoting Juki, Brother, Pegasus, Zoje, Eastman, Hashima, Kansai  …..etc.
We have been an established and popular company with an excellent track record for the best customer satisfaction. We have never compromised on the quality and the services provided to the customer. We believe in keeping the customers happy and providing them with products at a very competent price. We have an excellent staffs who will guide you with their best technology by keeping in constant touch with your company and informing about the new technologies & Machines
Please feel free to keep in touch with us about any of your machineries or service requirements/queries. Please note that we also specialize in Designing Garment Factories and its pilot units.
We look forward to a wonderful relationship together and success for all concerned.
Your Sincerely
Mohammad Islam.
name: ISM SEWING MACHINE

idea:
Bhupesh Daheria

CEO, Aegis School of Business, Data Science, Cyber Security &

Telecommunication

Managing Trustee of Aegis Knowledge Trust;

Founder: mUniversity.mobi Aegis Tech Skilling

Founder: Aegis Graham Bell Awards, Data Science Congress, EduTechCongress

Mr. Daheria has over 25 years’ experience in entrepreneurship, telecom, innovation, skilling, data science, higher education, and EduTech.

His life is focused on eradicating the birth penalty by offering quality education to the masses at affordable cost and improving the over quality and learning outcome of higher education in India. He founded mUniversity (mUni) which provides end to end solutions, education digital infrastructure, education marketplace for and MOOC platforms.

In 2002, with support from Bharti Airtel, he founded Aegis for developing future cross-functional telecom leaders. In 2015 he was instrumental in launching India’s first true Data Science program known as PGP in Data Science, Business Analytics & Big Data in association with IBM. Currently, this program is the best in Data Science in India and ranked among the top 5 in analytics. In 2017 he designed and launched India’s first Post Graduate Program in Cyber Security with the power on AI, Machine Learning and Cognitive in association with IBM to train and prepare for the next generation of cybersecurity professionals.

Under his leadership, Aegis has trained thousands of candidates for the Telecom Sector Skill council which is part of National Skill Development Corporation for Govt. of MP, Vodafone, Serco, Firstsource, Ericsson, Bharti Vidya Peth, D Y Patil University etc.

He also founded Aegis Graham Bell Awards in 2010 which is one of the largest innovation awards for TIME and SMAC (Telecom, Internet, Media, Edutainment, Social, Media, Analytics and Cloud).

He has setup Data Science Delivered to solve real-life problems with data and to develop breakthrough data products. He initiated Data Science Congress in 2017 to develop an eco-system for brining India at the forefront of Data Science, AI, Machine Learning, Analytics at the world forum.

Qualification: Bachelor of Engineering in Telecom from Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology Bhopal

Whitepaper/Research Paper:

• Whitepaper by Deloitte and Aegis on “Opportunities In Telecom Sector Arising from Big Data”

• Whitepaper by Aegis and Delloite on “Data Science for transforming the ICT Domain”

• Broadband The lifeline of Digital India – Aegis and Deloitte

• Enterprise mobility Putting people first - Aegis and PwC

Speaker

He has addressed over 55,000 professionals, students, and academician on Data Science, Big Data, Machine Learning etc through Aegis-IBM Data Science Meetups; Telecom Innovation Series on Bloomberg TV; Ontario Centres of Excellence (OCE) Discovery as the official invitee of Govt. of Canada; Future of Learning at TechMahindra i5; IMTC IBM; How MOOC can transform education at South Asian counties Vice-Chancellors meet at Udaipur; Big Data Opportunities in Telecom industries at Convergence India; India’s Education Future: From Traditional Systems to Innovative Models, organized on the occasion of the State visit to the Republic of India of his Excellency the Right Honourable David Johnston, Governor General of Canada; Cognitive IOT & Data Science at IOT Conference organized Institute of Engineers and Somaiya Institute etc

• How Innovation can succeed in Global & Rural Market Bloomberg

• Mobile Broadband Revolution can change face of India Bloomberg

LinkedIn profile: in.linkedin.com/in/bhupeshd
name: Bhupesh Daheria
